subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Army-Navy football game will be held in Philadelphia for five of the next eight years, including in 2010. The Naval Academy announced that the annual game between the service academies would be played at Philadelphia’s Lincoln Financial Field in 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015 and 2017.
